original_text: The people were amazed at his teaching, because he taught them as one who had authority, not as the teachers of the law.
korean_text: 뭇 사람이 그의 교훈에 놀라니 이는 그가 가르치시는 것이 권위 있는 자와 같고 서기관들과 같지 아니함일러라

sentences.original_text: The people were amazed at his teaching
because he taught them as one who had authority
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 권위를 가진 자처럼 그들을 가르쳤기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: not as the teachers of the law
